update.releaseNotes:
v3.3.2 - Changelog
Changed --- - Changed how Notification is updated when an Exception occurs. - Adjusted length of text separators in message log to be much shorter.
Fixed --- - Fix GW navigation due to bamboo. Stupid bamboo. - Fix GW selecting NM90 on the first day of GW. - Fix message log clearing at the wrong time. - Fix GW waiting to see if meat farming location was tapped when it didn't do it first.
